Beach.description: A serene sandy shore with gentle waves lapping against the coastline, scattered driftwood, and occasional crabs scuttling along. A peaceful yet challenging environment for new survivors.
challenges: Heat Exhaustion from the sun
Rising Tides that may flood your camp
Swarms of Crabs that may attack in groups
Unpredictable Strong Winds that make sheltering difficult

Mountain.description: A rugged, towering range of cliffs with bitterly cold winds, offering rich ores but hiding dangerous wildlife like wolves and bears. Only the bravest dare climb these heights.
challenges: Treacherous Steep Slopes that slow your movement
Sudden Avalanches triggered by shifting snow
Wild Animals that stalk the highlands
Low Oxygen due to the Thin Air at higher altitudes

Caves.description: Dark and oppressive caverns filled with valuable treasures and rich minerals, but the dangers of cave-ins, venomous creatures, and treacherous darkness await the unwary.
challenges: Bats that swarm and attack at night
Sudden Cave-In incidents causing injuries or trapping survivors
Complete Darkness, requiring light sources to navigate
Poisonous Pools that might cause harm if stepped into

Dark Forest.description: A dense, ominous forest where shadows linger even at noon, full of magical plants and ferocious beasts that lurk beneath the canopy.
challenges: Eerie Silence that makes you feel uneasy and watched
Poisonous Plants that can cause harm if touched
Ambush Predators that strike without warning
Shadow Beasts that hunt by night

Desert.description: A vast, barren desert with scorching heat, endless sand dunes, and hidden dangers. Only the most prepared adventurers can survive the extreme conditions and uncover the rare treasures it holds.
challenges: Extreme Heat that dehydrates and exhausts
Sandstorms that obscure visibility and slow progress
Treacherous Quicksand that can trap and swallow whole
Poisonous Creatures that hunt beneath the sand
